verses.verse: It happened,<WH4428> when all the kings of the Amorites,<WH567> who were beyond<WH5676> the Jordan<WH3383> westward,<WH3220> and all the kings<WH4428> of the Canaanites,<WH3669> who were by the sea,<WH3220> heard<WH8085> how that Yahweh<WH3068> had dried up<WH3001> the waters<WH4325> of the Jordan<WH3383> from before<WH6440> the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> until we had passed over,<WH5674> that their heart<WH3824> melted,<WH4549> neither was there spirit<WH7307> in them any more,<WH6440> because of the children<WH1121> of Israel.<WH3478>

At that time,<WH6256> Yahweh<WH3068> said<WH559> to Joshua,<WH3091> "Make<WH6213> flint<WH6697> knives,<WH2719> and circumcise<WH4135> again<WH7725> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> the second time.<WH8145>"
Joshua<WH3091> made<WH6213> himself flint<WH6697> knives,<WH2719> and circumcised<WH4135> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> at the hill<WH1389> of the foreskins.<WH6190>

This is the reason<WH1697> Joshua<WH3091> circumcised:<WH4135> all the people<WH5971> who came out<WH3318> of Egypt,<WH4714> who were males,<WH2145> even all the men<WH582> of war,<WH4421> died<WH4191> in the wilderness<WH4057> by the way,<WH1870> after they came out<WH3318> of Egypt.<WH4714>

For<WH3588> all the people<WH5971> who came out<WH3318> were circumcised;<WH4135> but all the people<WH5971> who were born<WH3209> in the wilderness<WH4057> by the way<WH1870> as they came out<WH3318> of Egypt<WH4714> had not been circumcised.<WH4135>

For the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> walked<WH1980> forty<WH705> years<WH8141> in the wilderness,<WH4057> until all the nation,<WH1471> even the men<WH582> of war<WH4421> who came out<WH3318> of Egypt,<WH4714> were consumed,<WH8552> because they didn't<WH8085> listen to the voice<WH6963> of Yahweh.<WH3068> Yahweh<WH3068> swore<WH7650> to them that he wouldn't<WH7200> let them see the land<WH776> which Yahweh<WH3068> swore<WH7650> to their fathers<WH1> that he would give<WH5414> us,<WH776> a land flowing<WH2100> with milk<WH2461> and honey.<WH1706>

Their children,<WH1121> whom he raised up<WH6965> in their place,<WH4135> were circumcised by Joshua;<WH3091> for they were uncircumcised,<WH6189> because they had not circumcised<WH4135> them on the way.<WH1870>
It happened,<WH8552> when they were done circumcising<WH4135> all the nation,<WH1471> that they stayed<WH3427> in their places in the camp<WH4264> until they were healed.<WH2421>

Yahweh<WH3068> said<WH559> to Joshua,<WH3091> "Today<WH3117> I have rolled away<WH1556> the reproach<WH2781> of Egypt<WH4714> from off you.<WH8034>" Therefore the name of that place<WH4725> was called<WH7121> Gilgal,<WH1537> to this day.<WH3117>

The children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> encamped<WH2583> in Gilgal.<WH1537> They kept<WH6213> the Passover<WH6453> on the fourteenth<WH702> day<WH3117> of the month<WH2320> at evening<WH6153> in the plains<WH6160> of Jericho.<WH3405>
They ate<WH398> unleavened cakes<WH4682> and parched grain<WH5669> of the produce<WH5669> of the land<WH776> on the next day<WH4283> after the Passover,<WH6453> in the same<WH6106> day.<WH3117>

The manna<WH4478> ceased<WH7673> on the next day,<WH4283> after they had eaten<WH398> of the produce<WH5669> of the land.<WH776> The children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> didn't<WH4478> have manna any more;<WH398> but they ate of the fruit<WH8393> of the land<WH776> of Canaan<WH3667> that year.<WH8141>

It happened,<WH3091> when Joshua was by Jericho,<WH3405> that he lifted up<WH5375> his eyes<WH5869> and looked,<WH7200> and behold,<WH376> a man stood<WH5975> in front of him with his sword<WH2719> drawn<WH8025> in his hand.<WH3027> Joshua<WH3091> went<WH3212> to him,<WH559> and said to him,<WH6862> "Are you for us, or for our adversaries?"

He said,<WH559> "No;<WH935> but I have come now as commander<WH8269> of Yahweh<WH3068>'s army.<WH6635>" Joshua<WH3091> fell<WH5307> on his face<WH6440> to the earth,<WH776> and worshipped,<WH7812> and said<WH559> to him,<WH113> "What does my lord say<WH559> to his servant?<WH5650>"

The prince<WH8269> of Yahweh<WH3068>'s army<WH6635> said<WH559> to Joshua,<WH3091> "Take your shoes<WH5275> off<WH5394> of your feet;<WH7272> for the place<WH4725> on which you stand<WH5975> is holy.<WH6944>" Joshua<WH3091> did so.<WH6213>
